TopicTitle: The First and also the Last big Excursion in 0.20. Probing Jool (Spoiler Alert)

Articles.Content:
Hi Guys,

so our time in 0.20 is almost over, also it was the state of the game when I joined it.

By watching the Early-looks of KSP-TV, Scott, HOCGaming and Pleborian, it occured to me that I haven't seen almost anything of the Kerbol-System at close.

So I wanted to send out some Probes to Jool.

Eacht Moon had to get one Probe on an Orbit and Jool & Laythe should get one atmospheric Probe sinking to its Soil.

(I have to add, that I had an unmaned Kethane-Rig on Bop, which I used for refueling and parked it later on around Pol, cause I havent brought enough Probes )

See my Pictures here, I hope you enjoy it.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

There is a mission reports sub forum set up for this kind of thing. Also, that is a lot of images. I suggest culling them down to the best ones, or turning some of your landings into gifs via an online site
Ouh, didnt know about the mission reports-Section. I will try that then.
